fields.description: Client name.
fields.name: __client_name

fields.description: Source name.
fields.name: __source_name

fields.description: Schema version.
fields.name: __schema_version

fields.description: Event timestamp.
fields.name: __event_timestamp

fields.description: Publish timestamp.
fields.name: __publish_timestamp

fields.description: The actual length for physical storage object in Manual Area (racks, refrigerators, freezers) AFTER Assignment step.
fields.name: actual_assets_in_manual_linear_ft

fields.description: (Optional)Earliest date that any product (excluding products in DYNAMIC area) associated with the given ECOM_ID was first seen with a non-zero quantity of units in Inventory Snapshot for the given mfc_id.
fields.name: first_seen_in_inventory_snapshot

fields.description: The length for physical storage object in Manual Area (racks, refrigerators, freezers) based on Cell Capacity Estimation BEFORE Assignment step.
fields.name: assets_in_manual_linear_ft

fields.description: Also storage_type. This is a physical object in which the products are assigned/placed. Available assets types: totes, racks, refrigerators, freezers.
fields.name: assets_type

fields.description: Weekly forecasted frequency of the SKU.
fields.name: average_lines_fc

fields.description: Weekly forecasted demand of the SKU (in units).
fields.name: average_qty_fc

fields.description: Case Height (inches).
fields.name: case_height

fields.description: Case Length (inches).
fields.name: case_length

fields.description: TRUE denotes that the item has to be stored by cases only. If this is not specified, then FALSE by default.
fields.name: case_storage

fields.description: Case Width (inches).
fields.name: case_width

fields.description: Category Hierarchy 1/ Department Name. Will be assigned no_info if the value is missing.
fields.name: category_level_1

fields.description: Category Hierarchy 2/ Category Name. Will be assigned no_info if the value is missing.
fields.name: category_level_2

fields.description: Category Hierarchy 3/ Subcategory Name. Will be assigned no_info if the value is missing.
fields.name: category_level_3

fields.description: Category Hierarchy 4. Will be assigned no_info if the value is missing.
fields.name: category_level_4

fields.description: Category Hierarchy 5. Will be assigned no_info if the value is missing.
fields.name: category_level_5

fields.description: Designation should be used on anything that should not be stored in a tote with a food item because of risk of odor or flavor contamination.  Chem items can be decanted to the OSR.
fields.name: chemical

fields.description: Stock to be held over a period of time depending on the average demand and the performance cycle.
fields.name: cycle_stock

fields.description: Arithmetic mean. Time increment equal to one day. The last 90 days are considered to be the observed period. It is recommended to use all days from the observed period to calculate this value.
fields.name: daily_average_qty_90_days

fields.description: (Optional)Average Quantity sold each week over the past 90 days/3 months.
fields.name: weekly_qty_90_days

fields.description: (Optional)Quantity sold in the past 60 days/2 months.
fields.name: qty_total_60_days

fields.description: (Optional)Average Quantity sold each day over the past 60 days/2 months.
fields.name: daily_average_qty_60_days

fields.description: (Optional)Average Quantity sold each week over the past 60 days/2 months.
fields.name: weekly_qty_60_days

fields.description: (Optional)Quantity sold in the past 30 days/1 month.
fields.name: qty_total_30_days

fields.description: (Optional)Average Quantity sold each day over the past 30 days/1 month.
fields.name: daily_average_qty_30_days

fields.description: (Optional)Average Quantity sold each week over the past 30 days/1 month.
fields.name: weekly_qty_30_days

fields.description: Product sales for the observed period.
fields.name: dollars_sold

fields.description: Direct Store Delivery vs Delivery From Warehouse. If missing from original Item Master, then FALSE as default.
fields.name: dsd

fields.description: Ecom Id is used by the retailer to identify a product entity selectable by customers in shopping applications. The primary key for all sources.
fields.name: ecom_item_id

fields.description: Number of either UNITS or CASES used in Slotting exercises. If storage_case is true for a specific product, then final_stock this is number of cases.
fields.name: final_stock

fields.description: final_stock in UNITS.
fields.name: final_stock_in_units

fields.description: Timestamp when results were generated from SDIA. UTC time.
fields.name: finish_ts

fields.description: Hazardous are items that can become an operations or safety risk if stored in the OSR, hence they should not be loaded into the OSR.
fields.name: hazard

fields.description: Temperature zone input.
fields.name: init_t_zone

fields.description: Indicates if the product is sold from the shop by weight or by piece (each).
fields.name: is_weight_variable_on_receipt

fields.description: Indicates if the product is sold on the website by weight or by piece (each).
fields.name: is_weight_variable_on_webcart

fields.description: Product storage.
fields.name: item_type

fields.description: How many product lines were placed in orders for the observed period.
fields.name: lines_total

fields.description: The lower limit from the 95% confidence interval for the average_lines_fc.
fields.name: lower_95_lines_fc

fields.description: The lower limit from the 95% confidence interval for the average_qty_fc.
fields.name: lower_95_qty_fc

fields.description: The max quantity of units that can be placed into the specific cell.
fields.name: max_qty_in_cell

fields.description: Recommended allocation.
fields.name: mfc_area

fields.description: MFC ID.
fields.name: mfc_id

fields.description: Identify if the product can be purchased for MFC.
fields.name: mfc_stop_buy

fields.description: Product Name.
fields.name: name

fields.description: How many cells is this product placed in. For products placed in the Manual Area only.
fields.name: num_of_cells

fields.description: Current location SKU is placed in. When slotting service is executed daily, it will extract point-in-time Inventory Snapshot data from IMS, and look at where the item is currently stored.
fields.name: original_location

fields.description: Quantity on site available at time the inventory snapshot was taken.
fields.name: original_qty

fields.description: Replenishment lead time for a SKU.
fields.name: performance_cycle

fields.description: Forced allocation.
fields.name: preset_mfc_area

fields.description: Product Height (inches).
fields.name: product_height

fields.description: TOM ID/IDs associated with considered ecom_item_id. Multiple product_ids can associate with the same ecom_item_id.
fields.name: product_ids

fields.description: Product Length (inches).
fields.name: product_length

fields.description: A numeric qualifier that reflects priority of a product in considered assortment. It is the demand of a SKU per space occupied by the recommended stock to have on hand. Higher the number, higher the priority.
fields.name: product_priority

fields.description: The productâ€™s priority value for the Manual and Shop Floor area grouped by temp_zone.
fields.name: product_priority_manual

fields.description: Product Weight (lbs).
fields.name: product_weight

fields.description: Product Width (inches).
fields.name: product_width

fields.description: Quantity sold in units over the last 90 days.
fields.name: qty_total_90_days

fields.description: Rank for products assigned into Manual and Shop Floor area aggregated by temp_zone.
fields.name: rank_in_manual

fields.description: Raw is used for items that should be stored at the lowest level of the OSR chilled section.
fields.name: raw

fields.description: Retailer name
fields.name: retailer

fields.description: Buffer stock depending on the customer service level desired (95% CSL is default).
fields.name: safety_stock

fields.description: The standard deviation of historical demand for the observed period. Time increment equal to one day. The last 90 days are considered to be the observed period. It is recommended to use all days from the observed period to calculate sd.
fields.name: sd

fields.description: Session name.
fields.name: session_name

fields.description: (Optional)Populated from Item Master; possible values are A, D, T, R, O or NULL.
fields.name: item_status_code

fields.description: Informative column. Currently Product Priority doesn't take into account Shelf Life, but sometimes we need to decide if it makes sense to move the item into OSR based on its shelf life and sales velocity.
fields.name: shelf_life

fields.description: Use to identify current location of an item if it doesn't exist in the Inventory Snapshot. Possible values: osr, manual, shop_floor.
fields.name: sleeping_areas

fields.description: TRUE denotes that the item can be placed on the top of another item in the tote or shelf. If this is not specified, then FALSE by default.
fields.name: stackable

fields.description: This is a sum of cycle_stock and safety_stock. Also known as Theoretical Inventory. Rounded to the case.
fields.name: sum_stock

fields.description: Temperature Zone.
fields.name: temp_zone

fields.description: Number of totes required to fit the recommended quantity = final_stock_in_units.
fields.name: totes

fields.description: Number of totes required to fit the original_qty.
fields.name: totes_for_current_stock

fields.description: Unit of measure.
fields.name: unit_of_measure

fields.description: Case pack quantity.
fields.name: units_per_case

fields.description: Optimistic weekly forecast of the SKU.
fields.name: upper_95_lines_fc

fields.description: Optimistic weekly forecasted demand of the SKU (in units).
fields.name: upper_95_qty_fc

fields.description: Vendor ID.
fields.name: vendor_id

fields.description: Comma separated field with all supplier-keep-buy s populated, ordered in the order provided in the supplier-info json object.
fields.name: vendor_keep_buy

fields.description: Vendor Name.
fields.name: vendor_name

fields.description: Business Rule around DSD is important and this field helps us apply that.
fields.name: vendor_type

fields.description: TRUE denotes that the item requires strictly vertical storage. If this is not specified, then FALSE by default.
fields.name: vertical_storage

fields.description: (Optional)Contains an explanation why we are allocating a product to a specific location.
fields.name: reason

fields.description: (Optional)Contains an explanation about customer decision.
fields.name: customer_decision

fields.description: Optional field.
fields.name: average_qty

fields.description: Optional field.
fields.name: qty_sold

fields.description: Optional field.
fields.name: category

fields.description: Optional field.
fields.name: daily_average_qty

fields.description: Optional field.
fields.name: department

fields.description: Optional field.
fields.name: subcategory
